main.name: Calvin Nguyen
main.description: Graduating student with 3 years of extensive full-stack development at PayPal & Startup. Capable of picking up new skills to ship scaling apps to production quickly. Seeking for Fall 2020 Co-op and Full-time Software Engineering starting Jan 2021.
main.bio: Hi, I'm Calvin, a self-motivated undergraduate senior at SJSU, San Jose, CA. I've experienced in both web & mobile (Android, iOS) platforms, focusing on full-stack web development. I love to design and build web services, scale the server, infrastructure and databases.
main.contactmessage: My inbox is always open. Whether for a potential project or just to say hi, I'll try my best to answer your email!

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

work.title: Full-stack Software Engineer
description: Working directly with CTO to initiate the use of micro-services for managing infrastructure using Golang, Node, gRPC, REST, and Swagger.
Building a real-time notification for end-to-end users with SocketIO in Node.js and Golang, Redis Pub/Sub, and Cloud Functions for handling multiple uploading files.
Built/ deployed a Swift prototype to TestFlight
Created and deployed React & Node on Cloud Storage and Compute Engine using Docker/Nginx, and Webpack.

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Pioneered iOS SDK with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi APIs for PayPal Here products
Built iOS libraries to develop EMV, Contactless Card Handler with mPOS devices using Swift.
Boosted testing experience of mPOS device faster by 3x in iOS and Android
Hands-on card processing experience with EMV/Contactless/Magstripe cards

work.title: Tech Writer
description: Publishing articles biweekly, get over 5k+ views and 2k+ reads per month.
Featured on Top Writer of TheStartup - Largest Medium's publication.
Received 50+ subscribers to the 'I Grow With Startups' series.
I wrote about a variety of Tech tutorials, news, tips and tricks on Server-side programming for developers.

work.title: Full-stack Software Engineer
description: Worked directly with Genessa Nannini to build and deploy onCampus, collecting data of on-campus events' involvement.
Intensive back-end development with Kraken.js, PostgreSQL, and Google Proximity API, Estimote Beacon.
Designed/developed UI using Apache Cordova, HTML/CSS/JavaScript
Collected data of 2000+ employees to enhance on-campus experience
Experience with Use-Case design, Class and Sequence diagrams using UML.

work.title: CS 61B Lab Assistant
description: Assisted students in lab & office hours in a Data Structure course of 900+ students
Enhanced analytical & debugging skills while helping students solve problems
Tutored 20+ students per week with homework, labs and projects
Work Primarily with Java 8
